This project includes very simple examples involving Desktop UI.
AWTFrameTestRunner: Demonstrates how to create an AWT Frame with components on it. The close button does nothing so you should kill the app to terminate it.
JFrameTestRunner: Demonstrates how to create a simple JFrame with a label component on it. The close button terminates the application.
